reviews.text: I love the Chop House. The food is hands down the best in Ann Arbor. We always go for the cheese platter appetizer and it is some of the best you will find. The prices are a little steep but once you taste the food, it is well worth it. The cocktails are alright and they need a bit more mixing before being served as they aren't a uniform flavor but outside of that, I highly recommend this place for an anniversary or birthday or just a nice date. Their cigar lounge is high quality and the atmosphere is perfect. I will always come back to this place.

A couple weeks ago, we enjoyed a dinner elsewhere in Ann Arbor and decided to head to Chop House after for an espresso and cigar. After a half mile walk we arrive to find out the cigar bar is non smoking due to a private party. Fine. No problem, we should have called. Tonight, we did the same thing. Except we called first to make sure the cigar lounge was open, we called, yes it’s open. Perfect, we walk there. Guess what, closed. Continuous bad service from this place. It’s overpriced we all know that, but it used to at least have good service. Not anymore. Save yourself the dull experience and go to the steak house around the corner.

The steaks were tender and thick and all of the appetizers were great. We also had very good service. It's a pretty fancy establishment. And they offer great discounts for birthdays. Roughly enough to make the birthday persons meal free, given that it's on the actual birthday.

Went here on two occasions. One was my girlfriend's birthday. It was a wonderful time. The staff were friendly and very speedy, and food was amazing. However, when I went for my club's business conference, it was a bit hectic-- understandably. Several orders were messed up, but they were corrected surprisingly fast. Overall, a great place to dine!

Pretty awesome place. Went doing restaurant week where you get a 3 course meal or something for $28. I ended up taking my wife for her birthday and got their birthday discount. Got the 11oz steak, calamari, mashed potatoes, and asparagus. All was good. Bathroom was nice and clean but a little intimate since everything is in one little corner. Ambience was great. Recommend seeing Kiara for best service. Overall great experience.
